Protocols/DynamicTypeResponsive.html#/s:.name: respondsToDynamicTypeChanges

Global Variables.html#/s:12airUtilities1.name: minimumLogLevel
Global Variables.html#/s:12airUtilities1.abstract: Logging will ignore any messages below this level. Set this anywhere to change the default.

Global Variables.html#/s:12airUtilities2.name: minimumErrorLogLevel
Global Variables.html#/s:12airUtilities2.abstract: When passing an Error, logging assumes you want to log it as .error. Set this anywhere to change the default.
